name: Elemental Golf
description:
In Elemental golf you play as a totally responsible son of a deity that needs to try and safely move their collection of elements from one place to another. The only problem is that there’s people in the way! Each element takes the form of a ball, so obviously the best way to get them there is to engage in a rousing round of mini golf!
